channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description:
We should all be fired up to vote Democratic thanks to the Dobbs decision and all the other rights the Supreme Court is poised to remove from all of us.

This is not just about women's rights, not even close.
item.source:markdown:
We should all be fired up to vote Democratic thanks to the Dobbs decision and all the other rights the Supreme Court is poised to remove from all of us.
This is not just about women's rights, not even close.

item.description: @Conaw Can you imagine, the last thing you see before you die is one of these robot dogs killing you.

item.description: When a company rep says "We apologize for any inconvenience" you think...
item.source:markdown: When a company rep says "We apologize for any inconvenience" you think...

item.description: @AdamSinger @kanyewest it's even better. they hire idiots to play the role of creatives, raise money based on their acting ability and then come up with a clever excuse for why the investment tanked after the ipo, or don't even bother because the idiots they fleeced don't matter anyway.
item.source:markdown: @AdamSinger @kanyewest it's even better. they hire idiots to play the role of creatives, raise money based on their acting ability and then come up with a clever excuse for why the investment tanked after the ipo, or don't even bother because the idiots they fleeced don't matter anyway.

item.description:
@dsearls We apologize for the inconvenience.

@dsearls Sorry we apologize for ANY inconvenience, we're not conceding that you were actually inconvenienced.
item.source:markdown:
@dsearls We apologize for the inconvenience.
@dsearls Sorry we apologize for ANY inconvenience, we're not conceding that you were actually inconvenienced.

item.description: The insurrectionists of Jan 6 busted into the Capitol, hit police with fire extinguishers, flagpoles, bats and pepper spray; they threatened to kill the vice president and tried to overthrow the 2020 election. Now, they want an apology. https://t.co/Gars5bGQ4i

item.description: When Biden first used the "Maga Republican" term I was skeptical, but I've been hearing reporters and pundits using the term, so it's caught. It's a way for McConnell to say hey not all Repubs are fascists. I'm sure they did some kind of deal. https://t.co/CP9SuoNxXt
item.source:markdown: When Biden first used the "Maga Republican" term I was skeptical, but I've been hearing reporters and pundits using the term, so it's caught. It's a way for McConnell to say hey not all Repubs are fascists. I'm sure they did some kind of deal. https://t.co/CP9SuoNxXt

item.description: I love how Spotify calls their locked-up "podcast" platform "https://t.co/G4bfRixW8a" -- it's the way Machiavelli would do it. If you're closed, say you're open -- and let everyone debate whether you're scum or just an opportunist.
item.source:markdown: I love how Spotify calls their locked-up "podcast" platform "https://t.co/G4bfRixW8a" -- it's the way Machiavelli would do it. If you're closed, say you're open -- and let everyone debate whether you're scum or just an opportunist.

item.description: @ScottHansonDE very cool! ;-)
item.source:markdown: @ScottHansonDE very cool! ;-)

item.description:
You should be listening to Countdown with Keith Olbermann.

He's saying the things I've been thinking about the news, how the business really works, from the inside, the things they will never say on CNN or MSNBC.

Plus he's incredibly funny. ;-)

https://t.co/xJtgyTIytk

Now the things he won't say about I Heart Radio, who owns this podcast.

  1. They are the former Clear Channel, a huge dominant force in broadcast radio.

  2. They would probably love to be Spotify, but they aren't so all their podcasts available "where ever you get your podcasts," my favorite phrase that I will never get tired of hearing. (I own that, I made sure podcasts would be that way.)

  3. I Heart Radio hopes to stop saying that at some point.

  4. I wonder how much they pay Olbermann or if it depends on whether they can lock it down?

  5. All that said, listen while it's not behind a paywall, it's wonderful stuff.
item.source:markdown:
You should be listening to Countdown with Keith Olbermann.
He's saying the things I've been thinking about the news, how the business really works, from the inside, the things they will never say on CNN or MSNBC.
Plus he's incredibly funny. ;-)
https://t.co/xJtgyTIytk
Now the things he won't say about I Heart Radio, who owns this podcast.
1. They are the former Clear Channel, a huge dominant force in broadcast radio.
2. They would probably love to be Spotify, but they aren't so all their podcasts available "where ever you get your podcasts," my favorite phrase that I will never get tired of hearing. (I own that, I made sure podcasts would be that way.)
3. I Heart Radio hopes to stop saying that at some point.
4. I wonder how much they pay Olbermann or if it depends on whether they can lock it down?
5. All that said, listen while it's not behind a paywall, it's wonderful stuff.

item.description:
@davemark What does it mean? Nothing. The watch has determined that you need a puzzle, and it has given you one with no answer. It's an Apple thing. Kind of like a zen koan but more compact.

https://t.co/eqTDkqNjNL

@davemark Alternatively it's a signal that the watch has decided to ignore you for a period of time.
The Most Alarming Case On The Supreme Court Docket You Haven’t Heard Of. https://t.co/GTSno1qUP8
item.source:markdown: The Most Alarming Case On The Supreme Court Docket You Haven’t Heard Of. https://t.co/GTSno1qUP8
